data.text: @davisforutah @GreenPartyUS @MAHAMOSA @LauraWellsCA Fair enough. I'm not even talking about the "election". On that topic though, our allies also reported Russian election meddling as well. Though that's water under the bridge. Thank you for responding to the article I posted.

@GoldenRuleLover @GreenPartyUS @MAHAMOSA @LauraWellsCA Don't get me wrong, I think you're probably right that there's something there. Cybersecurity has long been neglected in both the private and public spheres. And I would agree that itnshould be investigated. I'm just not taking the DHS' word on what did or didn't happen.

@davisforutah @GreenPartyUS @MAHAMOSA @LauraWellsCA I don't completely disagree AND I think there is a real issue here. All parties need to really look into, understand, & have a strategy to deal with the new warfare being implemented by NK, China & Russia. https://t.co/xTD7fWuseI

@GoldenRuleLover @GreenPartyUS @MAHAMOSA @LauraWellsCA history of deception and misinformation (e.g. Iraq's fictional WMDs).
I also hesitate on this issue because I understand the neoliberal history of making up pretenses for war, such as with Iraq and earlier Vietnam.

@GoldenRuleLover @GreenPartyUS @MAHAMOSA @LauraWellsCA I will offer a very high level opinion. I understand the very real concerns that people have about these matters. This certainly should not be taken lightly. At the same time, I also remain very skeptical of any information provided by our intelligence community given their
@GreenPartyUS @MAHAMOSA @LauraWellsCA @davisforutah I hope candidates will speak to this topic in the near future. https://t.co/b4StMAlxrT
